description.value: You flash through several possible timelines as you move. Stride up to your Speed. This movement doesn't provoke reactions, and you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] until the end of your turn. All creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] to you until the end of your turn. You can use Now You See Me while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

publication.title: Pathfinder #219: Lord of the Trinity Star
